name: Commando Training
Lore: 'Han''s Rebel strike team on the forest moon of Endor was highly trained in the use of blasters and explosives.',
Text: 'Deploy on your side of table. Each of your non-unique Rebels armed with a non-unique blaster is forfeit +2, adds 1 to his total weapon destiny and, where present, cumulatively adds 1 to total battle destiny. (Immune to Alter while your non-unique blaster is on table.)',
